scripts.start: f() { yarn cpenv ${1:-dev} && PORT=${PORT:-8888} react-scripts start; } ; f
scripts.build: f() { yarn cpenv ${1:-dev} && react-scripts build; } ; f
scripts.devtest: f() { yarn cpenv ${1:-dev} && CI=true react-scripts test; } ; f
scripts.test: f() { yarn cpenv ${1:-dev} && yarn lint && yarn devtest; } ; f
scripts.smoke: yarn lint && yarn devtest && yarn build
scripts.deploy: f() { yarn install && yarn build ${1:-dev} && aws s3://dashboard-${1:-dev}.playwings.co.kr --delete --region ap-northeast-1 --cache-control max-age=300; } ; f
